name: reserve-a-seat-for-the-talks-and-attend-a-workshop--kirkland-bartlett;issue-jira-6-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-02-register-registrationto-the-conference-capability-features-02-register-theme-features
title: Reserve a seat for the talks and attend a workshop (Kirkland Bartlett)

testSteps.description: Given that Kirkland Bartlett gets access to the ticket reservation page

children.description: Kirkland Bartlett visits the conference page
Kirkland Bartlett opens the browser at "/"
Kirkland Bartlett maximises the browser window
Kirkland Bartlett wants to register
Kirkland Bartlett clicks on the Register button

testSteps.description: When he buys a quantity of 2 vip tickets for the talks

children.description: Kirkland Bartlett buys a quantity of 2 vip tickets for the talks
Kirkland Bartlett buys a quantity of 2 tickets of type vip
Kirkland Bartlett clicks on the Talks tab
Kirkland Bartlett enters 2 into the Number of Vip Tickets field

testSteps.description: And he buys a quantity of 5 tickets for the workshop Workshop C

children.description: Kirkland Bartlett buys a quantity of 5 for the workshop Workshop C
Kirkland Bartlett buys a quantity of 5 tickets of type Workshop C
Kirkland Bartlett clicks on the Workshops tab
Kirkland Bartlett enters 5 into the Number of Workshop C Tickets field

testSteps.description: And he fills the registration form with his personal info: Kirkland Bartlett, joanGoodman, joangoodman@amtas.com, 18/10/1971, PANZENT, 338 Hope Street - Hickory - Montana - 755, Morningside, 65052, Italy

children.description: Kirkland Bartlett fills the registration form with his Kirkland Bartlett, joanGoodman, joangoodman@amtas.com, 18/10/1971, PANZENT, 338 Hope Street - Hickory - Montana - 755, Morningside, 65052, Italy
Kirkland Bartlett scrolls to the Continue button of the tickets section
Kirkland Bartlett clicks on the Continue button of the tickets section
Kirkland Bartlett enters Kirkland Bartlett into the Actor's Fullname
Kirkland Bartlett enters joanGoodman into the Actor's Nickname
Kirkland Bartlett enters joangoodman@amtas.com into the Actor's Email
Kirkland Bartlett picks the date 18/10/1971 on the Actor's Date of Birth
Kirkland Bartlett enters PANZENT into the Actor's Company
Kirkland Bartlett enters 338 Hope Street - Hickory - Montana - 755 into the Actor's Address
Kirkland Bartlett enters Morningside into the Actor's City
Kirkland Bartlett enters 65052 into the Actor's Zip
Kirkland Bartlett selects "Italy" from the Actor's Country
Kirkland Bartlett clicks on the Continue button of the registration form

testSteps.description: Then he sees the message 'Thank you to have been registered to the AT conference'

children.description: Kirkland Bartlett checks the text of the Thanking message for the registration
